languages.text: "Потому я боюсь новой встречи. Если он не простил и не забыл, он попытается вновь подчинить меня. А я... не уверена, что смогу ему сопротивляться. Не потому, что люблю его, но потому, что когда-то преклонялась перед ним".

"That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."
languages.original_text: "Потому я боюсь новой встречи. Если он не простил и не забыл, он попытается вновь подчинить меня. А я... не уверена, что смогу ему сопротивляться. Не потому, что люблю его, но потому, что когда-то преклонялась перед ним".

traits.locale_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “这就是为什么我不敢再次与他见面。如果他还没有原谅我、忘记我，那他就会再次打算支配我的人生，而我……我不确定我到底能不能拒绝他。这并不是因为我爱过他，而是因为我曾把他当成过我的偶像。”
languages.original_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."

traits.locale_text: “这就是为什么我不敢再次与他见面。如果他还没有原谅我、忘记我，那他就会再次打算支配我的人生，而我……我不确定我到底能不能拒绝他。这并不是因为我爱过他，而是因为我曾把他当成过我的偶像。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「だから、彼とまた会うのが怖いんだ。もし彼が許さず、忘れていなければ、またあたしを支配しようとするだろうから。そしてあたしは…彼に立ち向かえるかどうか自信がない。彼を愛しているからではなく、かつて彼を崇拝していたから」
languages.original_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."

traits.locale_text: 「だから、彼とまた会うのが怖いんだ。もし彼が許さず、忘れていなければ、またあたしを支配しようとするだろうから。そしてあたしは…彼に立ち向かえるかどうか自信がない。彼を愛しているからではなく、かつて彼を崇拝していたから」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Por eso me preocupa volver a verlo. Si no ha perdonado y olvidado mis acciones, volverá a intentar dominarme. Y... no sé si podré hacerle frente. No porque lo ame, sino porque hace mucho fue mi ídolo».
languages.original_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."

traits.locale_text: «Por eso me preocupa volver a verlo. Si no ha perdonado y olvidado mis acciones, volverá a intentar dominarme. Y... no sé si podré hacerle frente. No porque lo ame, sino porque hace mucho fue mi ídolo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Voilà pourquoi j'ai peur de le revoir. S'il ne m'a pas oubliée et qu'il m'en veut encore, il fera tout pour me dominer comme avant. Et... je ne sais pas si je serai capable de lui résister. Pas parce que je l'aime encore, mais parce que je l'adulais autrefois. »
languages.original_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà pourquoi j'ai peur de le revoir. S'il ne m'a pas oubliée et qu'il m'en veut encore, il fera tout pour me dominer comme avant. Et... je ne sais pas si je serai capable de lui résister. Pas parce que je l'aime encore, mais parce que je l'adulais autrefois. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Deshalb fürchte ich mich, ihm wieder zu begegnen. Wenn er mir nicht verziehen und die Sache vergessen hat, wird er wieder versuchen, mich zu dominieren. Und ich ... Ich weiß nicht, ob ich es schaffe, ihm die Stirn zu bieten. Nicht weil ich ihn liebe, sondern weil ich ihn früher vergötterte."
languages.original_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."

traits.locale_text: "Deshalb fürchte ich mich, ihm wieder zu begegnen. Wenn er mir nicht verziehen und die Sache vergessen hat, wird er wieder versuchen, mich zu dominieren. Und ich ... Ich weiß nicht, ob ich es schaffe, ihm die Stirn zu bieten. Nicht weil ich ihn liebe, sondern weil ich ihn früher vergötterte."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Onu görmekten bu yüzden korkuyorum. Eğer affedip unutmadıysa iplerimi yeniden eline almaya çalışacaktır. Ben... Ben de ona karşı gelebilir miyim emin değilim. Onu sevdiğim için değil, bir zamanlar onu idolleştirdiğim için."
languages.original_text: "That's why I'm afraid of seeing him again. If he hasn't forgiven and forgotten, he will try to dominate me again. And I... I'm not sure that I'll be able to stand up to him. Not because I love him, but because I once idolised him."

traits.locale_text: "Onu görmekten bu yüzden korkuyorum. Eğer affedip unutmadıysa, iplerimi yeniden eline almaya çalışacaktır. Ve ben... Ben de ona karşı gelebilir miyim emin değilim. Onu sevdiğim için değil, bir zamanlar onu idolleştirdiğim için."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
